Label: DBH
Comment: AKA Dopamine beta-hydrocylase</br>Located membrane-bound and intra-vesicular [PMID: 30372766]

Label: AADC
Comment: AKA Aromatic L-amino acid decarboxylase, DCC

Label: TPH1
Comment: AKA Tryptophan hydroxylase</br>Expressed in skin, gut and pineal gland (tissues where serotonint is expressed), and also in the CNS.

Label: TPH2
Comment: AKA Tryptophan hydroxylase</br>Expressed in neuronal cells, and the predominant isoform of the Central Nervous System (CNS).
